title: Navigating Stablecoin Risks: Frameworks, Challenges, and Best Practices
description: Following the collapse of Terra, many have launched their own stablecoin risk frameworks, each adopting unique approaches and their final outputs do not always agree with one another. We will take this opportunity to discuss the strengths and weaknesses of these different approaches, explore their potential use cases, and address the challenges of promoting risk-driven decisions over trend-driven ones.
